properties.entry:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT ENQ_NO , USER_ID , ENQUIRY_TYPE , ENQUIRY_TITLE , ENQUIRY_DATE , ANSWER_STATE FROM ENQUIRY E JOIN MEMBER USING(USER_ID)
ORDER BY ENQ_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
INSERT INTO ENQUIRY ( ENQ_NO , USER_ID , ENQUIRY_TYPE , ENQUIRY_TITLE , ENQUIRY_CONTENT , ENQUIRY_DATE , ANSWER_STATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_ENQ.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE , 'N' )
